column4: How do I know what's my computer's timezone and to change it? (it's 5 hours in the future :/ )
click to your time diplay at top right
that'd work - if I had the full ubuntu, I installed it with the alternate CD and I'm using fluxbox atm (Gnome is slooooooooow) so :/
besides when it installed, my timezone wasn't in the list and there was no option to choose another one though
